message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $8,750.  This is a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. Can you consider that?
